title: Ex-Google ad boss builds tracker-free search engine
description: Sridhar Ramaswamy says the technology sector has become "exploitative" of people's data.

title: Elon Musk, Twitter and the mysterious X app
description: The story of Musk buying Twitter, and how it began with "X, the everything app".

title: Elizabeth Holmes: Theranos founder gets hearing on new trial
description: Elizabeth Holmes requested a new trial after claiming federal prosecutors presented misleading evidence.
